verses.verse: Therefore <S%H199><s%>, Job <S%H347><s%>, I pray you <S%H8085><s%>, hear my speeches <S%H4405><s%>, and listen <S%H238><s%> to all my words <S%H1697><s%>.
Behold <S%H6605><s%>, now I have opened my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, my tongue <S%H3956><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> in my mouth <S%H2441><s%>.
My words <S%H561><s%> shall be of the uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%>: and my lips <S%H8193><s%> shall utter <S%H4448><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> clearly <S%H1305><s%>.
The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> has made <S%H6213><s%> me <S%H5397><s%>, and the breath of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> has given me life <S%H2421><s%>.
If you can <S%H3201><s%> answer <S%H7725><s%> me <S%H6186><s%>, set your words in order before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H3320><s%>, stand up.
Behold <S%H6310><s%>, I am according to your wish in God <S%H410><s%>'s place <S%H7169><s%>: I also am formed out of the clay <S%H2563><s%>.
Behold <S%H367><s%>, my terror shall not make you afraid <S%H1204><s%>, neither shall my hand <S%H405><s%> be heavy upon you <S%H3513><s%>.
Surely you have spoken <S%H559><s%> in my hearing <S%H241><s%>, and I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words <S%H4405><s%>, saying,
I am clean <S%H2134><s%> without transgression <S%H6588><s%>, I am innocent <S%H2643><s%>; neither is there iniquity in me <S%H5771><s%>.
Behold <S%H4672><s%>, he finds occasions <S%H8569><s%> against me <S%H2803><s%>, he counts me for his enemy <S%H341><s%>,
He puts <S%H7760><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in the stocks <S%H5465><s%>, he marks <S%H8104><s%> all my paths <S%H734><s%>.
Behold <S%H6663><s%>, in this you are not just: I will answer <S%H6030><s%> you <S%H433><s%>, that God is greater <S%H7235><s%> than man <S%H582><s%>.
Why do you argue <S%H7378><s%> against him <S%H6030><s%>? for he gives not account of any of his matters <S%H1697><s%>.
For God <S%H410><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> once <S%H259><s%>, Yes twice <S%H8147><s%>, yet man perceives it not <S%H7789><s%>.

In a dream <S%H2472><s%>, in a vision <S%H2384><s%> of the night <S%H3915><s%>, when deep <S%H8639><s%> sleep falls <S%H5307><s%> upon men <S%H582><s%>, in slumberings <S%H8572><s%> upon the bed <S%H4904><s%>;
Then he opens <S%H1540><s%> the ears <S%H241><s%> of men <S%H582><s%>, and seals <S%H2856><s%> their instruction <S%H4561><s%>,
That he may withdraw <S%H5493><s%> man <S%H120><s%> from his purpose <S%H4639><s%>, and hide <S%H3680><s%> pride <S%H1466><s%> from man <S%H1397><s%>.
He keeps back <S%H2820><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the pit <S%H7845><s%>, and his life <S%H2416><s%> from perishing <S%H5674><s%> by the sword <S%H7973><s%>.
He is chastened <S%H3198><s%> also with pain <S%H4341><s%> upon his bed <S%H4904><s%>, and the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his bones <S%H6106><s%> with strong pain <S%H386><s%>:
So that his life <S%H2416><s%> abhors <S%H2092><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, and his soul <S%H5315><s%> dainty <S%H8378><s%> food <S%H3978><s%>.
His flesh <S%H1320><s%> is consumed away <S%H3615><s%>, that it cannot be seen <S%H7210><s%>; and his bones <S%H6106><s%> that were not seen <S%H7200><s%> stick out <S%H8192><s%>.
Yes <S%H5315><s%>, his soul draws near <S%H7126><s%> unto the grave <S%H7845><s%>, and his life <S%H2416><s%> to the destroyers <S%H4191><s%>.

If there <S%H3426><s%> be a messenger <S%H4397><s%> with him <S%H3887><s%>, an interpreter, one <S%H259><s%> among a thousand <S%H505><s%>, to show <S%H5046><s%> unto man <S%H120><s%> his uprightness <S%H3476><s%>:
Then he is gracious <S%H2603><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, and says, Deliver <S%H6308><s%> him from going down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H7845><s%>: I have found <S%H4672><s%> a ransom <S%H3724><s%>.
His flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall be fresher <S%H7375><s%> than a child <S%H5290><s%>'s: he shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the days <S%H3117><s%> of his youth <S%H5934><s%>:

He shall pray <S%H6279><s%> unto God <S%H433><s%>, and he will be favorable <S%H7521><s%> unto him <S%H7200><s%>: and he shall see his face <S%H6440><s%> with joy <S%H8643><s%>: for he will render <S%H7725><s%> unto man <S%H582><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

He looks <S%H7789><s%> upon men <S%H582><s%>, and if any say <S%H559><s%>, I have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and perverted <S%H5753><s%> that which was right <S%H3477><s%>, and it profited me not <S%H7737><s%>;
He will deliver <S%H6299><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from going <S%H5674><s%> into the pit <S%H7845><s%>, and his life <S%H2416><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the light <S%H216><s%>.
Behold <S%H6466><s%>, all these things works God <S%H410><s%> oftentimes <S%H6471><s%> with man <S%H1397><s%>,
To bring back <S%H7725><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the pit <S%H7845><s%>, to be enlightened <S%H215><s%> with the light <S%H216><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.
Mark well <S%H7181><s%>, O Job <S%H347><s%>, listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H2790><s%>: hold your peace, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%>.
If you have <S%H3426><s%> any thing to say <S%H4405><s%>, answer <S%H7725><s%> me <S%H1696><s%>: speak, for I desire <S%H2654><s%> to justify you <S%H6663><s%>.
If not <S%H8085><s%>, listen unto me <S%H2790><s%>: hold your peace, and I shall teach <S%H502><s%> you wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
